title: Australia at school
creator_credit: Hugh Alexander, Geoffrey Collings and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Shows a range of schools from small country towns through to high schools in Sydney, grades from kindergarten to last year of high school. “A film outlining Australia’s system of primary and secondary education”. Cinematography by Frank Bagnall.
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh Alexander, Geoffrey Collings and Australian National Film Board
